name: Cat Hamster Cheese
description:
You're in the maze and need to get the cheese. But the maze is shifting !! And also there are cats that want to get you.

------------------------------------------------

You need to collect all the cheese. A turn consist in two phases :

1) you must push a tile to make a full row or column shift

2) you must move your mouse anywhere it can go, if it's on a cheese, you get the cheese !

At any point, if there is a path connected between you and a cat : you lose. So be careful before making your move.

All movements are done with the mouse.

-------------------------------------------------

This game was made in about three hours over the week-end with my best friend for Trijam #95. The theme was "hamsters".
